Title: Relates to convening an office-based surgery workgroup to make recommendations regarding appropriate reforms or policy changes
Summary: Convenes an office-based surgery workgroup to make recommendations regarding appropriate reforms or policy changes necessary and in the best interest of the public.
LawCode: Add ยง230-f, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to convening an office-based surgery workgroup to make recommendations regarding appropriate reforms or policy changes necessary and in the best interest of the public
